title: Update parallel runner to use new Merge() signature
description:
Update the parallel runner to use the new Merge() signature and improve messaging.

Files to modify:
- internal/parallel/runner.go

Implementation:
1. Change line 231 from Merge(wt) to Merge(wt, worktree.MergeOptions{})
2. Update the message on line 230 from "Merging to main..." to use result.TargetBranch after merge
   - e.g., "Merged to " + result.TargetBranch or similar

No new tests needed - existing parallel runner tests should still pass.
acceptance_criteria: go build ./internal/parallel/... succeeds; go test ./internal/parallel/... passes
closed_reason: Updated Merge() call to use new signature with MergeOptions{} parameter. Improved messaging to show target branch after merge.
